metadata.title: CVE-2020-23226 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulneratiblities exist in Cacti 1.2.12in (1) reports_admin.php, (2) data_queries.php, (3) data_input.php, (4)graph_templates.php, (5) graphs.php, (6) reports_admin.php, and (7)data_input.php.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
